testcase.classname: User Management App Initialization should initially not show validation alert

testcase.classname: User Management Cancel Button should do nothing when user clicks cancel button with no data in the form

testcase.classname: User Management Cancel Button should clear all entered values when user clicks cancel button

testcase.classname: User Management Validation should not add the user record to the list if any input fields is empty and should show an alert on screen
testcase.name: User Management Validation should not add the user record to the list if any input fields is empty and should show an alert on screen

testcase.classname: User Management Validation should not add the user record to the list if phone number is not 10 digits and should show an alert on screen
testcase.name: User Management Validation should not add the user record to the list if phone number is not 10 digits and should show an alert on screen

testcase.classname: User Management Validation should not add the user record to the list if phone number is 10 digits but starts with zero(0) and should show an alert on screen

testcase.classname: User Management Add/Edit Button should show validation error when user clicks Add/Edit button with no data in the form
testcase.name: User Management Add/Edit Button should show validation error when user clicks Add/Edit button with no data in the form

testcase.classname: User Management Add/Edit Button should not show validation alert when correct values are supplied with click of Add/Edit button

testcase.classname: User Management User List with Actions should check that after a user record is added all the fields are displayed along with the actions

testcase.classname: User Management User List with Actions should delete the user from the list when delete button is clicked on the user row

testcase.classname: User Management User List with Actions should populate the user details in the form for edit when edit button is clicked on the row

testcase.classname: User Management User List with Actions should add back the details of the user without any change if cancel button is clicked after edit button

testcase.classname: User Management User List with Actions should update the user in the list with new values when Add/User is clicked
